event.title: Celebration of Parents’ Day in India 2016
event.description:
Parents’ day celebrations is not originated in India, but as India is known for unity in diversity. People in the country would celebrate it to appreciate their parents for safe guarding them throughout their life.

Celebration of Parents’ Day in India 2016
